channel.title: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
channel.description: Lifelong fans of true crime stories Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark tell each other their favorite tales of murder and hear hometown crime stories from friends and fans.

item.title: MFM Presents: Waiting for Impact - Episode 1: "I've Been Thinking About You"
item.description:
My Favorite Murder presents the first episode of Waiting for Impact: A Dave Holmes Passion Project, a new limited series on Exactly Right. Dave Holmes has been obsessed with a pop culture disappearance for decades: what ever happened to Sudden Impact, the boy band who were featured in Boyz II Men's "Motownphilly" music video and then vanished? Before we dive into the mystery, we'll need to take a good look at life in 1991, when the music industry was flush, and what it was like to be a pop culture obsessive in a time before the internet. Plus, are we closer to the East Coast Family than we thought?

Listen and subscribe to Waiting for Impact on Apple Podcasts, Stitcher, Spotify, or wherever you listen to podcasts.

item.title: MFM Presents: Parent Footprint with Dr. Dan - "Reparenting with Georgia Hardstark"
item.description:
My Favorite Murder presents Parent Footprint with Dr. Dan featuring special guest Georgia Hardstark. In the Exactly Right network premiere episode, Dr. Dan and Georgia, who are also cousins, give insight into their family and beloved grandmother, discuss Georgia's openness about her mental health, including her addiction and recovery. The underlying theme of the episode is how to re-parent yourself in a loving and compassionate way.

Listen and subscribe to Parent Footprint with Dr. Dan on Apple Podcasts, Stitcher, Spotify, or wherever you listen to podcasts.

Today's episode is hosted by Steven Ray Morris -- MFM audio engineer and host of The Purrrcast -- covering the stories of Selena (Episode 32) and The Lady of the Dunes (Episode 133).

item.title: MFM Presents: Wicked Words - Dr. Katherine Ramsland: BTK Killer Dennis Rader
item.description:
My Favorite Murder introduces the first episode of Tenfold More Wicked Presents: Wicked Words. In her new true crime chat show, host Kate Winkler Dawson interviews forensic psychologist, Dr. Katherine Ramsland, who spent years interviewing BTK Killer Dennis Rader in prison. Find out what he taught her in this fascinating episode.

Listen and Subscribe to Wicked Words on the Tenfold More Wicked feed on Apple Podcasts, Stitcher, Spotify, or wherever you listen to podcasts.

item.title: My Favorite Murder Presents: The True Beauty Brooklyn Podcast - "Pivoting During a Pandemic, Inclusive Luxury Beauty Brands, & Love Your Hair with Sabrina Rowe"
item.description:
My Favorite Murder presents the network premiere episode of The True Beauty Brooklyn Podcast on Exactly Right! Hosts Alix Shapiro & Elizabeth Taylor kick off their launch the same way they started their show one year ago -- interviewing one of their dearest friends, resident hair and beauty guru SABRINA ROWE. Sabrina is the founder of the inclusive, sustainable, luxury beauty brand NTRL by Sabs (pronounced "natural"), and is a celebrity hair and makeup artist to clients like Phoebe Robinson, Ilana Glazer, Uzo Aduba and more.

Listen and subscribe to The True Beauty Brooklyn Podcast on Apple Podcasts, Stitcher, Spotify, or wherever you listen to podcasts.

item.title: My Favorite Murder Presents: Lady to Lady - "A Lil' Spooky All the Time" ft. Karen Kilgariff
item.description:
My Favorite Murder presents the first episode of Lady to Lady on Exactly Right Network! What better way to kick it off than with our very own Karen Kilgariff? Join the ladies as they chat about Taco Bell pizza, the anti-Grandpa Joe movement, accidentally sending mortifying emails to people, and more! They also answer a lady problem from a listener who was busted while internet stalking someone online.

Listen and subscribe to Lady to Lady on Apple Podcasts, Stitcher, Spotify, or wherever you listen to podcasts.

item.title: My Favorite Murder Presents: Tenfold More Wicked - Episode 1: All That is Wicked: The Schutts
item.description:
My Favorite Murder presents the first episode of Tenfold More Wicked. In 1842 Edward Rulloff, a mysterious young academic, charms his way into the Schutt family in Dryden, a small village in Upstate New York. He’s hardworking and loyal—he impresses the prominent family. Edward is a good husband, at first. But the Schutts quickly learn that he’s also arrogant, jealous…and vengeful.


Listen and subscribe to Tenfold More Wicked on Apple Podcasts, Stitcher, Spotify, or wherever you listen to podcasts.

item.title: My Favorite Murder Presents: The Fall Line - Season 9 - Episode 1
item.description:
My Favorite Murder presents the first episode of The Fall Line’s ninth season. This season, they investigates the cases of a missing teenager, LeRyan Nicholson, and an unidentified homicide victim, both set against one of the worst tornadoes that Nashville, TN has ever seen.

Listen and subscribe to The Fall Line on Apple Podcasts, Stitcher, Spotify, or wherever you listen to podcasts.
